page.title: 04NEW HOUSES IN WELFORD
page.content: There are some houses in Welford in the process of being built. The company which is building them is C.L. MURPHY L.T.D. This is a family business Mr Murphy runs it because he is the head of the family he has sites all over the country. When the houses are finished there will be seven detached houses.Each house will have four bedrooms two bathrooms (one upstairs one down stairs) kitchen lounge dining room utility Each of the houses will have a small garden of about one sixth of an acre.
